title: Luna – Recovery from Parvovirus
description: Luna, a 4-month-old Labrador, was admitted with severe parvovirus symptoms. After a 5-day treatment plan with IV fluids and antibiotics, she fully recovered.

title: Max – Hip Dysplasia Treatment
description: Max, a 3-year-old German Shepherd, underwent physiotherapy and medication for hip dysplasia. Improvement in mobility and quality of life was observed in 6 weeks.

title: Milo – Dental Surgery Success
description: Milo, a Persian cat, had severe gingivitis requiring dental extraction. The surgery was successful, and recovery was smooth with a soft diet regimen.

title: Bella – Skin Allergy Management
description: Bella, a Golden Retriever, showed signs of chronic skin irritation. A hypoallergenic diet and medicated baths reduced flare-ups significantly.

title: Charlie – Broken Leg Surgery
description: Charlie, a playful Beagle, broke his front leg after a jump. Surgery and 8 weeks of rest brought full recovery.

title: Simba – Feline Asthma Relief
description: Simba, a 2-year-old tabby, had recurrent coughing spells. Nebulizer treatment and steroids helped manage asthma symptoms effectively.

title: Coco – Weight Management Program
description: Coco, a 5-year-old Dachshund, struggled with obesity. A vet-supervised diet and exercise plan helped her shed 4kg over 3 months.

title: Rocky – Tick Fever Recovery
description: Rocky, an indie dog, was diagnosed with tick fever. Prompt treatment with antibiotics led to full recovery within 10 days.

title: Whiskers – Urinary Blockage Surgery
description: Whiskers, a male cat, was rushed in with a urinary blockage. Emergency surgery was performed and the cat recovered with a special diet.

title: Buddy – Kennel Cough Recovery
description: Buddy, a pug, contracted kennel cough after a kennel stay. With cough suppressants and rest, he bounced back within 2 weeks.
